quote: As a system of philosophy it is not like the Tower of Babel, so daring its high aim as to seek a shelter against God's anger; but it is like a pyramid poised on its apex.
author: Adam Sedgwick

quote: Anger becomes limiting, restricting. You can't see through it. While anger is there, look at that, too. But after a while, you have to look at something else.
author: Thylias Moss

quote: The anger and the brutality against everything can readily from one hour to the next be transformed into its opposite.
author: Thomas Bernhard

quote: There's a difference between an outburst of spontaneous anger, which doesn't have a political objective, and a more measured response that we saw in the Occupy Wall Street movement.
author: David Harvey

quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body the two are ever united.
author: Wilhelm von Humboldt

quote: The mind is the most important part of achieving any fitness goal. Mental change always comes before physical change.
author: Matt McGorry

quote: You need to put what you learn into practice and do it over and over again until it's a habit. I always say, 'Seeing is not believing. Doing is believing.' There is a lot to learn about fitness, nutrition and emotions, but once you do, you can master them instead of them mastering you.
author: Brett Hoebel

quote: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
author: Lee Haney

quote: Swimming is normal for me. I'm relaxed. I'm comfortable, and I know my surroundings. It's my home.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
author: Gene Tunney

quote: Number one, like yourself. Number two, you have to eat healthy. And number three, you've got to squeeze your buns. That's my formula.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: Practice puts brains in your muscles.
author: Sam Snead

quote: Our growing softness, our increasing lack of physical fitness, is a menace to our security.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: You can always improve your fitness if you keep training.
author: Pastor Maldonado

quote: I don't smoke, don't drink much, and go to the gym five times a week. I live a healthy lifestyle and feel great. I can run a marathon, you know.
author: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: Fitness is important, but the most important thing is how you adapt and the way you feel physically. To adapt to a new position. To try to change your game.
author: Fernando Torres

quote: A feeble body weakens the mind.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: The value and utility of any experiment are determined by the fitness of the material to the purpose for which it is used, and thus in the case before us it cannot be immaterial what plants are subjected to experiment and in what manner such experiment is conducted.
author: Gregor Mendel

quote: Resting for me is fitness training.
author: Jenson Button

quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: My wife and I work out together almost every day. It's just a great way to spend time together. We're going to run a marathon together later this year, and that's one more goal that we'll accomplish as husband and wife.
author: Bill Rancic

quote: In my judgment, physical fitness is basic to all forms of excellence and to a strong, confident nation.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: Sport is not just about entertainment. It is equally about winning and losing, pooling and galvanising the energy of the youth, upgrading people's physical fitness and mental prowess.
author: Nita Ambani

quote: My fitness journey will be a lifelong journey.
author: Khloe Kardashian

quote: As a longtime practitioner of yoga and a person who's been involved in physical fitness my whole life, I can tell you, yoga helps you achieve altered states of consciousness. It is not just stretching. The only way you can say that it's stretching is if you haven't done it, or that you haven't done it rigorously for a long period of time.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: Regularity in the hours of rising and retiring, perseverance in exercise, adaptation of dress to the variations of climate, simple and nutritious aliment, and temperance in all things are necessary branches of the regimen of health.
author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

quote: Exercise is the chief source of improvement in our faculties.
author: Hugh Blair

quote: I like exercise. I like a healthy body.
author: Erin Gray

quote: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
author: Joey Adams

quote: I attend to my fitness. I go the gym every day and try to maintain my physical fitness; without that, it is tough to take challenges on the chess board.
author: Viswanathan Anand

quote: I have never taken any exercise, except sleeping and resting, and I never intend to take any.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You must also give mental and physical fitness priority.
author: Jim Otto

quote: Promoting healthy lifestyles and encouraging fitness are so important for our children's development and reducing the nation's epidemic of childhood obesity.
author: Marcia Fudge

quote: I try and groom myself, be it through fitness or dance.
author: Yami Gautam

quote: My weight fluctuates depending on my mood and my current devotion to my fitness routine.
author: Lena Dunham

quote: Don't get hung up on the size. If you feel bad about yourself because a 12 is what fits, take a Sharpie, and write '6' on the label.
author: Stacy London

quote: It's so easy to lose your fitness and so hard to gain it back.
author: Alex Morgan

quote: When the child begins to think and to make use of the written language to express his rudimentary thinking, he is ready for elementary work; and this fitness is a question not of age or other incidental circumstance but of mental maturity.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: I don't lift weights. I do fitness exercises to stay strong.
author: Chad le Clos

quote: The first time I see a jogger smiling, I'll consider it.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Exercise is labor without weariness.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: For exercise, I now run with my chocolate Lab puppy, Oscar.
author: Daniela Pestova

quote: I would rather exercise than read a newspaper.
author: Kim Alexis

quote: Like most people I can be lazy, so it's nice to have a goal or deadline or reason to work out. I feel better when I get to exercise, or when I'm outdoors. I like to hike, swim and run, and I love to play soccer.
author: Viggo Mortensen

quote: I didn't have the same fitness or ability as the other girls, so I had to beat them with my mind.
author: Martina Hingis

quote: I think it's more important to be fit so that you can be healthy and enjoy activities than it is to have a good body.
author: Rachel Blanchard

quote: It's challenging, but you have to at least try to eat right and exercise.
author: Joely Fisher

quote: You can't get rid of it with exercise alone. You can do the most vigorous exercise and only burn up 300 calories in an hour. If you've got fat on your body, the exercise firms and tones the muscles. But when you use that tape measure, what makes it bigger? It's the fat!
author: Jack LaLanne

quote: I love to swim for miles I could just go back and forth.
author: Jill Clayburgh

quote: What's important is to get into shape and then not to have to worry about it. I don't want to get on stage and not being able to do something. Not being physically fit doesn't work for me.
author: Chris Cornell

quote: My job is to be fit and I'm really blessed that I get to go and work out and live a really healthy lifestyle.
author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

quote: Fitness is not an option. It's part of my job.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: No one ceases to be a man, no one forfeits his rights to civilization merely by being more or less uncultured, and since the Filipino is regarded as a fit citizen when he is asked to pay taxes or shed his blood to defend the fatherland, why must this fitness be denied him when the question arises of granting him some right?
author: Jose Rizal

quote: I love fitness, yoga. I love fashion. On the weekends, I try to relax. I have pretty crazy weeks. I like spas and nice dinners. I'm not much of a club person. I like to hang on the beach in Malibu.
author: Charlotte McKinney

quote: You can be in excellent physical shape, with low cholesterol, a healthy body weight and good overall physical fitness - but that doesn't necessarily mean you're healthy.
author: Michael Greger

quote: The spirit of the Olympic movement is great for young people because it teaches them about the training and discipline required to compete. Even if they don't make the teams, they can rededicate their lives to the art of sport, discipline, and physical fitness.
author: Richard M. Daley

quote: I suffer panic attacks which has made me really conscious about my fitness and I have become addicted to jogging. It might sound odd but a lot of good has come out of it. My fans send letters saying they have taken up jogging because I do it.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: Fitness is a luxury when you are busy!
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: Never, ever exercise in front of a TV or while reading. You lose 50 percent of the benefit of the exercise by not hearing and feeling your heart rate, your sweat and the pain levels that need to be encountered in fitness training.
author: Kevin R. Stone

quote: If you ask me about my success story, the secret is I know when to pull myself back. I don't overexpose myself; I give proper gaps whenever I can. I do not over spend myself, I keep myself busy in lot of activities. I really work hard; I work harder than others, by focussing on my fitness level and studying music.
author: Sonu Nigam

quote: I am pleased with the fitness that I have.
author: Lin Dan

quote: My own preferred fitness regime is to use my bicycle.
author: Paul Hollywood

quote: Fitness, defending, the mental stuff - those were all weaknesses of mine. And I turned those into strengths.
author: Carli Lloyd

quote: I do a lot of biking. I need that mileage and the long-distance stuff because tennis demands it. My fitness trainer is always trying to convince me to do an Ironman. I can probably run the marathon, I can make the 112 miles on the bike, but I will never swim for 2.4 miles. I will die after 100 meters.
author: Tomas Berdych

quote: It takes about four days of virtuous living to create a little weight loss. That also happens to be the time required to get used to eating less. In other words, if you can get past day three of a fitness regimen, things improve.
author: Martha Beck

quote: I'm quite into fitness, and I have a fantastic personal trainer who knows me, knows my body, knows when to push me, and knows when not to push me. She doesn't make me do 20 burpees in a row and instead focuses on strengthening my core, telling me we need to focus on making me into 'a tall giraffe'!
author: Poppy Delevingne

quote: Teaching kids about health and fitness is important to me. It's about being fit for life.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: People need to have clear goals about why they are exercising, and they should consult a fitness expert to find out what kind of exercise is suitable.
author: Lynn Davies

quote: For me, triathlons were something that was down to me and my fitness. Now, I really enjoy the pain in the triathlon of chasing someone down. It's a bit like chasing down Nico Rosberg in the last few laps at Silverstone - it makes you feel alive.
author: Jenson Button

quote: If someone thinks, 'I'll spend the off season working on my fitness and I'll come back a better cricketer,' I don't think that's enough. You need to spend a lot of time working on your skills and honing your skills.
author: Rahul Dravid

quote: I try to come at fitness and nutrition from a perspective of gentleness and what will make me feel good afterwards. I try to stay out of the mindset of needing to fix myself. I do whatever seems fun to me.
author: Taylor Schilling

quote: Muscles come and go flab lasts.
author: Bill Vaughan

quote: I recommend that people try new stuff or take new fitness classes all the time. It's important to mix up your routine, not only for your body, but also for your mental state.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: I think if you exercise, your state of mind - my state of mind - is usually more at ease, ready for more mental challenges. Once I get the physical stuff out of the way it always seems like I have more calmness and better self-esteem.
author: Stone Gossard

quote: Training is such a vital part of preparation for a game, you really do train to play. It tops up your ability, like sharpening a carving knife. You can get away with not doing it for a while, as long as you have reached a certain standard of fitness.
author: Graeme Le Saux

quote: Oh, and once, when I was in the Marines, I got a perfect score on my physical fitness test.
author: Drew Carey

quote: My Daddy liked physical fitness and wanted me to be a prizefighter.
author: Judy Johnson

quote: Cycling keeps me lean and I need to stay in shape, especially as I still like eating chocolate and ice-cream! I like to go mountain biking too. Running is also good; it's what we were designed to do as humans, so it comes naturally.
author: Mark Webber

quote: I would like to thank everyone who supported me to be fit for the Euros. I had some fitness problems before the tournament, but I am here now!
author: Andriy Shevchenko

quote: Fitness has always been one of the top priorities in my life because that's the way I grew up, with soccer being the sport of choice.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: Our children are obese, either have or being threatened by diabetes, high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and not socially adjusting properly to others because of a lack of fitness.
author: Richard Simmons

quote: I can jog, but I can't run. That's hard for me. I like the fact that I can jog for fitness, but to me there's a huge difference between jogging and running.
author: Mary Decker

quote: For years, I always thought it was hilarious that I was this fitness guru, because fitness was just a tool I utilized to help people improve their confidence. For me, it's never been about fitness. It's always been about helping to empower people.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: A drunkard in the gutter is just where he ought to be, according to the fitness and tendency of things. Nature has set upon him the process of decline and dissolution by which she removes things which have survived their usefulness.
author: William Graham Sumner

quote: If a man achieves victory over this body, who in the world can exercise power over him? He who rules himself rules over the whole world.
author: Vinoba Bhave

quote: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Never hurry. Take plenty of exercise. Always be cheerful. Take all the sleep you need. You may expect to be well.
author: James Freeman Clarke

quote: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
author: George A. Sheehan

quote: I wanted to get really fit. I wanted to lose some weight. So I've been doing Pilates and yoga, trying to lean out my body so I won't be bulky.
author: Serena Williams

quote: What's wrong with extreme dieting and hard-core fitness plans is that they don't take into account the rest of your life.
author: Alison Sweeney

quote: When you're singing, you're using extra muscles, and it requires a lot of exercise and breathing. You can't do that if you're a sissy. If I have any fitness advice for people, I'd tell them to sing more. It's good therapy, too.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Doing nothing would stress me out. So I am still pretty much active practicing judo with my friends, who are former judo athletes, to maintain our fitness as well as the friendships among us. In my spare time, I usually go jogging around the Gelora Bung Karno stadium or head to the gym.
author: Joe Taslim

quote: People assume that you need to run fast to get to optimum fitness, but the truth is endurance lifting makes you stronger and leaner.
author: Greg Rutherford

quote: I would say 90 percent of the stuff we do is technical anyway. If you look at a two-hour training day, 12 minutes are probably spent running or gaining fitness.
author: Ashton Eaton

quote: Mental fitness is served by consciously redirecting our attention away from the constant bombardment from the media whose reason to be seems to be focused on keeping us in a state of constant alert.
author: David Perlmutter

quote: In my view, fitness training isn't that important in England, as they all train with such intensity anyway and have a competitive edge when just sprinting. The matches are all hard-fought, too.
author: Claudio Ranieri

quote: I do yoga, I do Bikram and I run, and I eat really healthy.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: One of the things I've always enjoyed is moving around and staying fit. Physicality is such a big part of being an actor, but it's also about stillness and silence.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: Being a dancer is my metaphor for life because you have to know your body. Being a dancer and paying attention to fitness is all about moving in balance.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: Just as you can't blindly follow fashion, you can't follow fitness, either.
author: Anushka Sharma

quote: I'm not a fitness model; I'm just a singer. If people focus on that, that's what I care about.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: I've been into exercise my whole life, been a runner and been into health and fitness always.
author: Sissy Spacek

quote: I tell my sons all the time, 'The most important thing in your life is fitness,' but a lot of fighters go overboard.
author: George Foreman

quote: I created a fitness club with five friends. We have weekly check-ins and a reward system - and group penalties if one of us slacks off.
author: Bryce Dallas Howard

quote: There is a moment when you get older when your metabolism slows down and you don't feel like working out any more, so you don't want to keep yourself fit any more, but that's your decision. Why should you be judged for it?
author: Janet Jackson

quote: I say, 'Use it or lose it.' I have my own fitness regime, which is centred around stretching, free-weights and fast walking. I also have a trainer half of the year, as I spend my summers in the south of France where I swim a lot.
author: Joan Collins

quote: My assumption was that people are already motivated to go to a fitness class. That's who I am. I was already ready to go out there and get to class. All I needed was a search tool. But it turns out people need more than that, and that's why gym memberships exist.
author: Payal Kadakia

quote: Some people have that school of thought where fitness isn't enjoyable, but we're making it enjoyable, I think, by making it more fun, challenging, and engaging rather than this boring thing that you have to do. It's about using technology and data to change this experience.
author: Payal Kadakia

quote: The manager and the fitness staff condition every training session. They plan it out week by week on what players need. If players need a rest, they will do that; if players need to work hard, they will do that as well.
author: Harry Kane

quote: We've all tried to bunk our gym session or dance class. A single routine can get monotonous. That's why I have decided to make my fitness regime fun by incorporating different workouts into my schedule. From dancing to yoga, I plan to keep it as interesting as possible so I'm never bored of working out.
author: Disha Patani

quote: I understand only three things - films, fitness, and food.
author: Rakul Preet Singh

quote: For fitness, I've just bought a watch which keeps a track of how many calories I burn, what's my heart rate, which is very fascinating.
author: Yami Gautam

quote: All we're trying to do is change how people think about fitness. And build Under Armour into the biggest brand in the entire land.
author: Kevin Plank

quote: For a while after college, I was thinking of becoming a fitness trainer, and I am a certified aqua trainer.
author: Dylan Lauren
